name: Rotate (Rokku0)
description:
Rotates is a 2D videogame for mobiles.

You can find it in Google PlayStore.

Rotate is an Arcade video game where you control a continuously advancing vehicle in a closed arena. 

You can turn the vehicle by pressing the sides of the screen.

Dodge dangers like mines, bombs and missiles. 

Collect gas tanks to keep the car moving forward, smash turrets to earn extra points. 

Buy new vehicles from the store.
